TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LdapSessionOptions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The class is used to get or set various LDAP session options.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoReconnect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoReconnect : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: The property specifies if auto-reconnect is enabled.
Docs.value: 如果自动重新连接已启用，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DomainName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DomainName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The property returns the domain to which this connection is bound.
Docs.value: 此连接绑定到的域。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FastConcurrentBind() cil managed

Docs.summary: The method enables support for fast concurrent binds.
Docs.exception: This method does not work on the current platform.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HostName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HostName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The property returns the name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.
Docs.value: 与连接关联的 LDAP 服务器的名称。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostReachable As Boolean
public: property bool HostReachable { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: The property specifies whether the host is reachable.
Docs.value: 如果主机可访问，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LocatorFlags LocatorFlag { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LocatorFlags get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LocatorFlags value); };

Docs.summary: The property specifies one of the values of the enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.
Docs.value: 枚举值之一，在定位域控制器时需要使用这些值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingKeepAliveTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PingKeepAliveTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.
Docs.value: 一个 对象，该对象指定在从服务器获得上一次响应之后，在发送“keep-alive”ping 命令之前客户端应该等待的最小秒数。
Docs.exception: The specified time span is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PingLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PingLimit : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The property contains the number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.
Docs.value: 未答复的 ping 命令的数目，这些 ping 命令是客户端在关闭连接之前发送的。
Docs.exception: The specified value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingWaitTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PingWaitTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.
Docs.value: 一个 对象，该对象指定客户端在发送 ping 命令之后等待响应返回的毫秒数。
Docs.exception: The specified time span is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ProtocolVersion { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ProtocolVersion : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The property specifies the LDAP protocol version to use.
Docs.value: 要使用的 LDAP 协议版本。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::QueryClientCertificateCallback ^ QueryClientCertificate { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::QueryClientCertificateCallback ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::QueryClientCertificateCallback ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.
Docs.value: 一个 对象，该对象指定建立 SSL 连接时用来指定客户端证书的默认回调函数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection>对象也将设置，在指定的证书<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>忽略属性。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::ReferralCallback ^ ReferralCallback { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::ReferralCallback ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::ReferralCallback ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.
Docs.value: 一个 对象，该对象指定追踪转交时使用的默认回调函数。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::ReferralChasingOptions ReferralChasing { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::ReferralChasingOptions get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::ReferralChasingOptions value); };

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.
Docs.value: 一个 对象，该对象指定 LDAP 库如何遵循 LDAP 服务器返回的转交。
Docs.exception: The specified value is not defined in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReferralHopLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ReferralHopLimit : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The property specifies the number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.
Docs.value: 追踪转交时允许的跃点数。
Docs.exception: The specified value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RootDseCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RootDseCache : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: The property enables the internal RootDSE cache.
Docs.value: 如果启用了缓存，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SaslMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SaslMethod : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The property specifies the preferred Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) binding method.
Docs.value: 首选 SASL 绑定方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Sealing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Sealing : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: The property enables Kerberos encryption.
Docs.value: 如果启用了 Kerberos，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SecureSocketLayer { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SecureSocketLayer : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: The property enables secure socket layer on connection.
Docs.value: 如果启用了安全套接字层，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityContext As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SecurityContext { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: The property specifies the security context associated with the current connection.
Docs.value: 与当前连接关联的安全上下文。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan SendTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.SendTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies the send time-out.
Docs.value: 指定发送超时时间的 对象。
Docs.exception: The value specified is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Signing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Signing : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: The property enables Kerberos encryption.
Docs.value: 如果启用了 Kerberos，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that contains data about the current secure connection.
Docs.value: 对象，包含有关当前安全连接的数据。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SspiFlag { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SspiFlag : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The property specifies the flags to pass to the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) InitializeSecurityContext function. For more information about the InitializeSecurityContext function, see the InitializeSecurityContext function topic in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Docs.value: 要传递给 SSPI InitializeSecurityContext 函数的标志。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartTransportLayerSecurity(class System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection controls) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains the controls to use.
Docs.summary: The method starts transport layer security encryption.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StopTransportLayerSecurity() cil managed

Docs.summary: The method ends transport layer security encryption.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TcpKeepAlive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TcpKeepAlive : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: The property enables TCP keep-alive.
Docs.value: 如果启用了 TCP Keep-alive，则此属性为 ，否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::VerifyServerCertificateCallback ^ VerifyServerCertificate { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::VerifyServerCertificateCallback ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::VerifyServerCertificateCallback ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property contains a object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.
Docs.value: 一个 对象，该对象指定建立 SSL 连接时用来验证服务器证书的默认回调方法。
